name: BeReal
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: be real
des:
Be Real is a thoughtful discussion experience. Put down devices and distractions. Discover more about people with fun, mindfulness, connection and authenticity.

Increase digital wellbeing with regular playtime! Inspirational’s new game, Be Real, was created as a result of extensive interviews with families struggling with screen time. Over and again we heard a desire to step away from digital life and be real with loved ones. This challenge turned to inspiration.

The Inspirational team is excited to offer you 30 FREE Be Real questions to connect you. When you are ready for more you can visit www.inspirational.com to unlock paid voice content on Alexa, or order 365 days of printed cards to use throughout the year. 

Inspirational is on a mission to modernize the art of authentic conversations. We want to be sure everyone feels included, so we invited our friend Coral the Star to show us some perspective along the way. We believe you will become fast friends. :)

How to Play
Start with
“Alexa, open Be Real”
“Alexa, talk to Be Real”
“Alexa, launch Be Real” or simply
“Alexa, Be Real”
 
A question is announced and after a pause you are asked whether you would like to answer it. If you reply “yes” the question will be repeated before you answer. If you reply “no” you will receive a new one. When you are ready for your next question, simply say
 
“Alexa, Be Real!”

Let’s play!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
